name: Chazen Museum of Art

Wow!!! Beautiful park. Gorgeous shelter with fireplace and concessions.

name: Lucille
reviews: Highly recommend the Wednesday Date Night Special! A fun, delicious takeout option to enjoy with someone special! $30 for 3-courses (salad, pizza, and...

name: Madison Mallards
reviews: My friends and I love going to Mallards games, it's one of our summer traditions! We usually do the Great Dane Duck Blind, because with dinner, drinks, and...

name: Baraboo River Canoe & Kayak Rentals
reviews:
Had a great time rafting down the caraboo river. 

Staff was ** extremely friendly**.

Kayaks were is good working condition. 

Would go again, next time...
We had a great time on our Kayak adventure with Baraboo River Canoe & Kayal Rentals. They offer a variety of scenic Kayak Trips that you can take depending...
Fantastic rental location! Everyone working was super friendly and helpful, very thorough details of the trip, and even offered us bugspray before the trip....

name: Swissland Miniture Golf

name: Dancing Goat Distillery
reviews:

Beautiful building, stellar craft drinks and a stunning...

name: Essen Haus
reviews: We were looking for a place for a fish fry that would not be jammed especially with the coronavirus upon us.  Essen Haus fit the bill despite so-so reviews...

name: Ferry Bluff Eagle Council Overlook

name: The Thirsty Goat

Solid place for beer, good food and trivia! Bar staff are awesome here, super kind and friendly. Food menu is legit and rotating seasonal beers always keeps...

name: Campo di Bella
reviews: My wife and I had been looking for a local farm-to-table experience and found Campo di Bella. Our first visit was a Saturday evening which consisted of a...

name: Furger Family Farm
reviews:
Lovely family farm in a beautiful location.  Friendly folks and loads of berries.

They don't use any chemicals, so my kids could snack as we picked.
We stopped in and picked 2 1/2 flats of strawberries in no time flat, only went about 10 ft. before we had all our containers full, that's how loaded the...

name: Aldo Leopold Nature Center
reviews: Great nature center, and nature area with trails around the prairie and marshy area.  We enjoyed playing with all the stuff in the lobby, and also the cool...
What a great spot. A lovely facility with neat trails through a variety of natural areas. It also is connected to the Edna Taylor Conservation Area so that...
Just finished hiking this. Very peaceful with tons of birds chirping.  70 percent shaded.  Easy parking and friendly staff.  Clean bathrooms.

name: Indian Lake Park
reviews: An absolute gem of a park that you can hike your dogs around on. It's basically one big open field set just off Indian Lake. Gorgeous and wide open in the...
This is a wonderful little gem near Madison, only about 30 minutes out of town. I've been to the Indian Lake Trail Run several years in a row, which is held...
Definitely a hidden gem of southern Wisconsin! I went here at sunset and the views from the lookout by the chapel were stunning. The upkeep of the chapel...

name: Crescendo Espresso Bar + Music Cafe
reviews: Yo, this is a solid joint.  The atmosphere is pretty nice.  One wall is floor to ceiling windows and while that can make it a bit cold in the winter, it...

Friendly services and quiet spot for studying or just day-dreaming.  I like their butchur block table tops and self-service (clean after yourself) policy....

name: I/O Arcade Bar
reviews: My friend and I went here for the first time yesterday. I haven't played arcade games in decades and it was so fun to play games, have a drink and enjoy the...
There's a decent selection of games. Many of the titles are just a quarter so you can get by with a roll all night if you're into more of the classic-type...
The line up of pinball machines is pretty impressive and known even by a friend of mine in the Netherlands. The local tap bear line up isn't bad either....

name: Wisconsin Scaryland
reviews: Easy enough to find and plenty of parking. We were pretty excited because it was a haunted house where they could actually touch you. It ended up being...
Worst haunted house I've ever been to especially for the price.   There were hardly any people working there most of the employees were outside lighting...
Just the right amount of scary ! Went with family and had a great time ! Not into scary stuff but really enjoyed this.

name: Deerfield Pistol & Archery Center
reviews: Staff is super pleasant and knowledgeable.  In the past couple of months I've taken a couple of classes including the Wisconsin CCW course and have been...
Great place to go if you are only interested in target shooting. Range is great, employees are knowledgeable and very helpful. They will be able to answer...
My all time favorite indoor shooting range. Great and friendly staff. Went shooting at their indoor range last Sunday with a group of my friends. My gun...

name: Gibraltar Rock State Natural Area
reviews: A friend recommended this spot recently, and I can't believe I hadn't heard of it sooner! It's not too far from Madison, but is such a neat little hike with...
Beautiful hike!  We like taking the Ice Age Trail up through the woods to the top.  It's a popular spot.  Don't let parking stop you.  It's worth it!
The first to review??  That surprises me, this is a very cool state park.  I've seen the sign for Gibraltar a few times on my way to Devil's Lake and today,...

name: Mershon's Cidery
reviews: What a great atmosphere! I really liked that it's in the warehouse in which it is fermented.  Of course, any place with album covers on the wall and games...

name: The Sylvee
reviews:
This was my first trip to the Sylvee.
It definitely won't be my last.
We attended the Avett brothers concert on November 16th.
This venue is unique to the...
I'm sad to say but I was a bit disappointed by The Sylvee! I was at first excited to try out a new venue in madison, but I realized quickly I prefer a lot...

name: Holiday Fantasy In Lights
reviews:
Used to come to this 15 years ago when I lived in the area... hasn't changed much.  In fact most of the lights are the same as they were long ago!  

Still...

This annual light exhibit is a nice holiday event.  It is a short drive from downtown or off the Beltline on John Nolan Drive.

It is a drive thru exhibit...
My family and I had a great time. It's worth preserving as part of Madison's holiday traditions.

name: Monona Farmer's Market
reviews: One of the smallest farmers' markets in Madison, but also one of the friendliest. They have live music every week and picnic tables where you can snack,...
We're regulars, and the small size of this market makes it quick an easily navigable.

name: School Grounds Cafe
reviews: Great coffee, scones, atmosphere and a very friendly staff. I will be back again next time I'm in the area.

I just love this spot!

First off, if you couldn't guess... the cafe is an old school house!  Super cute.

The workers are always so friendly and...
I was looking for a coffee shop on my route to work, which is Stoughton Rd and the interstate.  Someone-- ironically one of my former teachers-- recommended...

name: Ice Age Trail - Montrose Segment
reviews: This is a fun section of the ice age trail just outside of Belleville. It has some nice elevation changes and the beautiful outcroppings are very cool. I...

name: Meinpferde Farm
reviews: Pam and Phil are the best. I have been a client here for a little over a year now and have had nothing but positive experiences. They put a lot of care into...

name: Madison Ghost Walks
reviews: Lisa was such a delight! We did our Capitol Square ghost walk on a very cold and windy night but this didn't deter us from enjoying the tour and having fun....

name: Charlie's On Main

The parking can be a...

name: Circle M Market Farm

name: Dolphins Cove
reviews: Such a nice place to take younger kids. I have a PAC membership and this is definitely a nice perk to have for the family. It's a lot closer to where I live...

name: Gates of Heaven
reviews: This is a wonderfully preserved Temple. It's a treasure and a testament to the Jewish history of Madison.

name: Badger Motor Car Company

name: HopCat
reviews: It is great to see a business conscious about the environment and their level of waste. Hopcat diverts up to 90% of their waste from landfills. All of their...

name: Orpheum Theater

name: Rossi's Pizza

name: Keva Sports Center
reviews: Rec team with abusive hostile coach. Don't recommend this place to instill love of sport.

name: McKee Farms Park
reviews: This is a wonderful park for walking, playing or just about anything. There are tons of things for kids to play on, soccer fields and a splash park. We love...
McKee Farms Park is one of my favorite places to be. I raised my kids in that neighborhood and we have many happy memories from there. It is a very well...

name: BB Jack's Cottage Grove
reviews: My boyfriend and I ordered food for pick up! We both got the pulled pork sandwich and sweet potato fries. Both are a good choice! The bbq sauce has an...

name: Screamin Acres
reviews: An amazing experience! Honestly, would have given 5 stars, but getting our tickets was a bit of a fiasco. We all bought tickets online to expedite  the...

name: Madison International Speedway
reviews: Had a great time here at their season finale. Fireworks included. When we first got there and ordered a round of beers, my friend and I commented that we...
Great track with affordable family pricing! The racing is great! Concession stand is awesome too! Great place to bring the family!
If you want a fun night out with the kids, or if you are into auto racing, the Madison International Speedway is the place for you. It is a high banked 1/2...

name: Parfrey's Glen
reviews: Our family loved this trail! There's a .7 mile walk slightly uphill on a paved, then gravel path. Once you get to the sign saying it's the end of the...

A beautiful gorge with a small waterfall as a reward at the end. Parfrey's Glen is a must see feature if you visit Baraboo or the Devil's Lake area.  The...

name: Market Square Theatres
reviews: For a $3 movie theater, this place is awesome! It doesn't have the fancy reclining seats, you don't reserve your spot ahead of time, but it really is a...
For about $3.50 for a movie at any time of the day and any day of the week, Market Square Theaters is definitely a steal for the price. Where else can you...
